name: MessageHeader.responsible
title: MessageHeader.responsible
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: The person or organization that accepts overall responsibility for the contents of the message. The implication is that the message event happened under the policies of the responsible party.
element.comment: Usually only for the request but can be used in a response.
element.requirements: Need to know for audit/traceback requirements and possibly for authorization.
